name: Greeting Check
description: Check if email starts with a greeting
justification_fail: No greeting found at the start of the email.

name: Clear Subject
description: Check if subject line is present and not empty
justification_fail: Subject line is missing or empty.

name: Professional Tone
description: Ensure the email does not contain informal slang
condition: not any(word in email.get('body', '').lower().split() for word in ['dude', 'yo', 'hey', 'wassup', 'gonna', 'wanna'])

name: Attachment Check
description: Verify email has at least one image attachment
